Articles.Content: Does anyone have any idea if there is an IVA for the KAX Horizon cockpit? Such an awesome mod but the lack of a decent IVA really deters me from using it.

No, unfortunately most cockpits from its expansion do not have IVAs either. It is being worked on, and will be mates. EDIT: Made.

Edited December 12, 2015 by RA3236
You can see
